args: ▷Boy, Cleo sure got mad at us.◁\nThat was a long lecture.
Hey, kids. I caught the end of that mega\ntongue-lashing you got. What happened?\nDid you guys try to pull a prank?
...So the prince told you that mischief\nwas all just part of people having fun\nand you ran with it, eh?
But I don't understand how pranks could\nbe fun for everyone.
▷So we figured it might make sense if we\ntried one ourselves—which we did.◁
Okay, I see what the deal is here,\nso just leave it to me.
I'll show you how to pull off a prank\nthat surprises and delights everyone!
Why did Luca call me here...?
Why is it so dark in here? The sun won't\neven set for hours yet.
EEEK! AAAHHH! EEEEP! IS IT RAIN?!\nIS IT SNOW?! HOW COULD THIS BE\nHAPPENING INSIDE A ROOOOOOM?!
EEEE...uh. Wait, this isn't rain. It's CANDY!
Luca! And, um, Laxi? I'm so confused.
Yeah, that's my bad. I just meant to play\na quick little prank on you, but I guess I\ngave you quite the scare instead.
But the candy is actually a present for you,\nso take as much as you want!
Of course! So do ya like it?
I love it! Thank you, Luca! Thank you, Laxi!
Though she was pranked, Pia was happy.\n▷So it DOES work if you do it right!◁
Sure does! The important thing is to\nalways have a sense of fun about it.
So long as you've got that, your pranks\nwill give folks permission to laugh a little\ninstead of...ya know. Enraging them.
And if you add a little bit of that to a gift,\nit becomes a SURPRISE gift that sends\npeople clear over the moon!

Well, take the gift I gave Pia earlier.
If I just handed her some candy, it'd be
pretty boring. I mean, candy's great,
but you get what I mean.
But if you surprise 'em a little first, and\nthen reveal the truth, it's more fun for me\nAND the person getting pranked!
▷Yeah, I suppose you wouldn't easily\nforget a gift like that.◁
Exactly! It becomes a treasured\nHalloween memory for life!
Pia's kinda shy and quiet, so I knew she'd\nhave trouble with all the Halloween stuff\nother people get up to.
But now she has some great memories\nof the holiday to carry with her!
▷So that was your reason for choosing\nPia as your victim!◁
Aw, cut it out before I start to blush.
Anyway, I'm out. You two play tons of\npranks and really enjoy your Halloween!
Luca's reason for pranks was unexpected.\n▷Right? I can't believe he did all that\nbecause he was worried about Pia.◁
▷And that makes me think about\nthe time back then when Luca...◁\nMascula?
▷Do you remember when Luca surprised\nus by suspending that weird thing in the\nair with some string?◁
Of course. What about it?\n▷Well, maybe that prank was also\na sign of Luca's thoughtfulness.◁

How do you mean?
▷You know! Like with Pia! Maybe he was
worried about someone and just trying to
help them out.◁
▷Back then, you and I were pretty worried\nabout the Halloween party, right?◁
▷But when Luca pranked us, it turned into\na whole thing with everyone and helped us\nfit in to the action.◁

You're overthinking this. There's a high
probability it was merely a coincidence.
▷No, really! I think it was because Luca
was worried about the two of us.◁
▷He wanted us to enjoy our Halloween.◁
C'mon, you guys should try it out.\nIt'll make Halloween a blast for you!
You two play tons of pranks and really\nenjoy your Halloween!
Yes, I suppose he did say that.
(I thought of Luca's prank as no more than\na nuisance, but perhaps it was actually a\nsign of his thoughtfulness.)
So you believe that Luca...helped us?\n▷That's exactly what I think.◁
In that case, I have a proposal for you.\n▷Oh? What is it?◁
Let us return the favor and play a\nHalloween prank on Luca.
I don't want to only be a receiver of\nkindness. If one pranks you, you prank\nthem back; one kindness for another.
▷I love it, Laxi! Let's do it!◁
▷After all, a Halloween prank is\nsomething that makes people happy!◁
▷So I wanna pull one on my best buddy\nLuca and enjoy it together!◁
Then we agree. Commencing operations.\n▷Let's make it the best prank ever!◁
